sn54.13:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn54.13:1.3: “atthi nu kho, bhante, ekadhammo bhavito bahulikato cattaro dhamme paripureti, cattaro dhamma bhavita bahulikata satta dhamme paripurenti, satta dhamma bhavita bahulikata dve dhamme paripurenti”ti?
sn54.13:2.1: “Atthi kho, ananda, ekadhammo bhavito bahulikato cattaro dhamme paripureti, cattaro dhamma bhavita bahulikata satta dhamme paripurenti, satta dhamma bhavita bahulikata dve dhamme paripurenti”ti.
sn54.13:3.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, ekadhammo bhavito bahulikato cattaro dhamme paripureti, cattaro dhamma bhavita bahulikata satta dhamme paripurenti, satta dhamma bhavita bahulikata dve dhamme paripurenti”ti?
sn54.13:3.2: “Anapanassatisamadhi kho, ananda, ekadhammo bhavito bahulikato cattaro satipatthane paripureti, cattaro satipatthana bhavita bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti, satta bojjhanga bhavita bahulikata vijjavimuttim paripurenti.
sn54.13:4.1: Katham bhavito, ananda, anapanassatisamadhi katham bahulikato cattaro satipatthane paripureti?
sn54.13:4.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.13:4.4: Digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati …pe…
sn54.13:5.1: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati;
sn54.13:5.3: ‘passambhayam kayasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati—
sn54.13:5.4: kaye kayanupassi, ananda, bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.13:5.7: Tasmatihananda, kaye kayanupassi bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.13:6.1: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu ‘pitippatisamvedi assasissami’ti sikkhati,
sn54.13:6.4: ‘passambhayam cittasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam cittasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati—
sn54.13:6.5: vedanasu vedananupassi, ananda, bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.13:6.7: Vedanannataraham, ananda, etam vadami, yadidam—assasapassasanam sadhukam manasikaram.
sn54.13:6.8: Tasmatihananda, vedanasu vedananupassi bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.13:7.1: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu ‘cittappatisamvedi assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘cittappatisamvedi passasissami’ti sikkhati;
sn54.13:7.4: ‘vimocayam cittam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayam cittam passasissami’ti sikkhati—
sn54.13:7.5: citte cittanupassi, ananda, bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.13:7.7: Naham, ananda, mutthassatissa asampajanassa anapanassatisamadhibhavanam vadami.
sn54.13:7.8: Tasmatihananda, citte cittanupassi bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.13:8.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi, ananda, bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.13:8.6: So yam tam hoti abhijjhadomanassanam pahanam tam pannaya disva sadhukam ajjhupekkhita hoti.
sn54.13:8.7: Tasmatihananda, dhammesu dhammanupassi bhikkhu tasmim samaye viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn54.13:9.1: Evam bhavito kho, ananda, anapanassatisamadhi evam bahulikato cattaro satipatthane paripureti.
sn54.13:10.1: Katham bhavita cananda, cattaro satipatthana katham bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti?
sn54.13:10.2: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati—
sn54.13:10.3: upatthitassa tasmim samaye bhikkhuno sati hoti asammuttha.
sn54.13:10.4: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhuno upatthita sati hoti asammuttha—satisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, satisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, satisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:11.1: So tatha sato viharanto tam dhammam pannaya pavicinati pavicarati parivimamsamapajjati.
sn54.13:11.2: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu tatha sato viharanto tam dhammam pannaya pavicinati pavicarati parivimamsamapajjati—
sn54.13:11.3: dhammavicayasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, dhammavicayasambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, dhammavicayasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:12.1: Tassa tam dhammam pannaya pavicinato pavicarato parivimamsamapajjato araddham hoti viriyam asallinam.
sn54.13:12.2: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhuno tam dhammam pannaya pavicinato pavicarato parivimamsamapajjato araddham hoti viriyam asallinam—
sn54.13:12.3: viriyasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, viriyasambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, viriyasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:13.2: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhuno araddhaviriyassa uppajjati piti niramisa—
sn54.13:13.3: pitisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, pitisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, pitisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:14.2: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhuno pitimanassa kayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati—
sn54.13:14.3: passaddhisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, passaddhisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, passaddhisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:15.2: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhuno passaddhakayassa sukhino cittam samadhiyati—
sn54.13:15.3: samadhisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, samadhisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, samadhisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:16.1: So tathasamahitam cittam sadhukam ajjhupekkhita hoti.
sn54.13:16.2: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu tathasamahitam cittam sadhukam ajjhupekkhita hoti—
sn54.13:16.3: upekkhasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, upekkhasambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, upekkhasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:17.4: upatthitassa tasmim samaye bhikkhuno sati hoti asammuttha.
sn54.13:17.5: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhuno upatthita sati hoti asammuttha—
sn54.13:17.6: satisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, satisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, satisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:18.1: So tathasamahitam cittam sadhukam ajjhupekkhita hoti.
sn54.13:18.2: Yasmim samaye, ananda, bhikkhu tathasamahitam cittam sadhukam ajjhupekkhita hoti—
sn54.13:18.3: upekkhasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, upekkhasambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, upekkhasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn54.13:18.4: Evam bhavita kho, ananda, cattaro satipatthana evam bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti.
sn54.13:19.1: Katham bhavita, ananda, satta bojjhanga katham bahulikata vijjavimuttim paripurenti?
sn54.13:19.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim,
sn54.13:19.4: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn54.13:19.5: Evam bhavita kho, ananda, satta bojjhanga evam bahulikata vijjavimuttim paripurenti”ti.
